definition: an appearance of reflected light, appear briefly
details:
noun
- an appearance of reflected light
= synonyms: gleaming
- a flash of light (especially reflected light)
= synonyms: gleaming
verb
- appear briefly
= example: appear briefly
= synonyms: flash
- shine brightly, like a star or a light
= synonyms: glimmer
- be shiny, as if wet
= synonyms: glitter
